entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning this evening. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early in the morning then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
